Text:
-----------------
Personal Notes
-----------------
While 3rd party plugins may seem "sexy" to download and add to photoshop; keep this in mind:

1. The BEST plugin is KNOWLEDGE.
2. Using plugins; you never learn how to do it correctly.
3. You don't have full control of the plugin.

The best advice i can give to anyone who use Photoshop is pick up a tutorial or try to do things on your own. This way, you learn new things during the process. Photoshop can do everything needed when it comes to graphics design. 

Why bog down Photoshop wtih unnecessary plugins?
